mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SEARCH_DTTM FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'PRDTDIV' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CODE_NM AS PRDT_DIV_NM , CODE_ID , SORT_NO , ROUND(ROUND(SUM(TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) TRST_QTY , ROUND(ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) REAL_TRST_QTY , ROUND(SUM(TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) TRST_AMT , ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) REAL_TRST_AMT , ROUND(ROUND(max(PLAN_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) PLAN_WT FROM (SELECT CODE_NM , CODE_ID , SORT_NO FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'PRDTDIV' AND USE_YN = 'Y') C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NVL(PRDT_DIV,'PRDTDIV99') PRDT_DIV, sum(plan_wt) plan_wt FROM TB_SD01M01 B WHERE B.PLAN_YM = #{searchYm} AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2' GROUP BY NVL(PRDT_DIV,'PRDTDIV99')) ON CODE_ID = PRDT_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT B.PRDT_DIV , TRST_WT , REAL_TRST_WT , TRST_AMT , REAL_TRST_AMT FROM TB_AR02M01 A , TB_BM01M01 B WHERE A.TRST_PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD AND TRST_DT BETWEEN #{searchYm} || '01' AND #{searchYm} || '31' AND A.SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2') T ON T.PRDT_DIV = C.CODE_ID WHERE PLAN_WT != 0 OR REAL_TRST_WT != 0 GROUP BY CODE_ID, CODE_NM, SORT_NO ORDER BY SORT_NO )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'CO' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NM CLNT_NM, nvl(TRST_WT,0) TRST_QTY, nvl(REAL_TRST_WT,0) REAL_TRST_QTY, nvl(TRST_AMT,0) TRST_AMT, nvl(REAL_TRST_AMT,0) REAL_TRST_AMT, nvl(PLAN_WT,0) PLAN_WT FROM (SELECT CODE_NM , CODE_ID , SORT_NO FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'CO' AND USE_YN = 'Y') C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CO_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) TRST_WT, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) REAL_TRST_WT, ROUND(SUM(TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) TRST_AMT, ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) REAL_TRST_AMT FROM TB_AR02M01 WHERE TRST_DT BETWEEN #{searchYm} || '01' AND #{searchYm} || '31' AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2' GROUP BY CO_CD ) T ON C.CODE_ID = T.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CO_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(PLAN_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) PLAN_WT FROM TB_SD01M01 B WHERE B.PLAN_YM = #{searchYm} AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2' GROUP BY CO_CD) B ON C.CODE_ID = B.CO_CD ORDER BY C.SORT_NO

SELECT TRST_CLNT_CD, CLNT_NM CLNT_NM, nvl(TRST_WT,0) TRST_QTY, nvl(REAL_TRST_WT,0) REAL_TRST_QTY, nvl(TRST_AMT,0) TRST_AMT, nvl(REAL_TRST_AMT,0) REAL_TRST_AMT, nvl(PLAN_WT,0) PLAN_WT FROM (SELECT CLNT_CD , CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y') C INNER JOIN (SELECT TRST_CLNT_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) TRST_WT, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) REAL_TRST_WT, ROUND(SUM(TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) TRST_AMT, ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) REAL_TRST_AMT FROM TB_AR02M01 WHERE TRST_DT BETWEEN #{searchYm} || '01' AND #{searchYm} || '31' AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2' GROUP BY TRST_CLNT_CD ) T ON C.CLNT_CD = T.TRST_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CLNT_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(PLAN_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) PLAN_WT FROM TB_SD01M01 B WHERE B.PLAN_YM = #{searchYm} AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2' GROUP BY CLNT_CD) B ON C.CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD ORDER BY C.CLNT_CD
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'CO' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NM CLNT_NM, nvl(TRST_WT,0) TRST_QTY, nvl(REAL_TRST_WT,0) REAL_TRST_QTY, nvl(TRST_AMT,0) TRST_AMT, nvl(REAL_TRST_AMT,0) REAL_TRST_AMT, nvl(PLAN_WT,0) PLAN_WT FROM (SELECT CODE_NM , CODE_ID , SORT_NO FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'CO' AND USE_YN = 'Y') C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CO_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) TRST_WT, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) REAL_TRST_WT, ROUND(SUM(TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) TRST_AMT, ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) REAL_TRST_AMT FROM TB_AR02M01 WHERE TRST_DT BETWEEN #{searchYm} || '01' AND #{searchYm} || '31' AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH1' GROUP BY CO_CD ) T ON C.CODE_ID = T.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CO_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(PLAN_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) PLAN_WT FROM TB_SD01M01 B WHERE B.PLAN_YM = #{searchYm} AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH1' GROUP BY CO_CD) B ON C.CODE_ID = B.CO_CD ORDER BY C.SORT_NO

SELECT TRST_CLNT_CD, CLNT_NM CLNT_NM, nvl(TRST_WT,0) TRST_QTY, nvl(REAL_TRST_WT,0) REAL_TRST_QTY, nvl(TRST_AMT,0) TRST_AMT, nvl(REAL_TRST_AMT,0) REAL_TRST_AMT, nvl(PLAN_WT,0) PLAN_WT FROM (SELECT CLNT_CD , CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_DIV_CD = 'CLNTDIV01' ) C INNER JOIN (SELECT TRST_CLNT_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) TRST_WT, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) REAL_TRST_WT, ROUND(SUM(TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) TRST_AMT, ROUND(SUM(REAL_TRST_AMT) /1000000, 0) REAL_TRST_AMT FROM TB_AR02M01 WHERE TRST_DT BETWEEN #{searchYm} || '01' AND #{searchYm} || '31' AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH1' GROUP BY TRST_CLNT_CD ) T ON C.CLNT_CD = T.TRST_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CLNT_CD, ROUND(ROUND(SUM(PLAN_WT) /1000, 0) / #{searchUnit}, 0) PLAN_WT FROM TB_SD01M01 B WHERE B.PLAN_YM = #{searchYm} AND SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH1' GROUP BY CLNT_CD) B ON C.CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD ORDER BY T.REAL_TRST_WT DESC

SELECT ROUND(SUM(SELPCH1_QTY) / #{searchUnit}, 0) SELPCH1_QTY , ROUND(SUM(SELPCH2_QTY) / #{searchUnit}, 0) SELPCH2_QTY , TRST_DT FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(SELPCH_CD, 'SELPCH1', REAL_TRST_QTY)), 0) SELPCH1_QTY , NVL(SUM(DECODE(SELPCH_CD, 'SELPCH2', REAL_TRST_QTY)), 0) SELPCH2_QTY , SUBSTRING(TRST_DT, 0, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(TRST_DT, 5, 2) TRST_DT FROM TB_AR02M01 WHERE TRST_DT IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTRING(TRST_DT, 0, 4) = SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(TRST_DT, 0, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(TRST_DT, 5, 2) UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-01' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-02' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-03' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-04' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-05' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-06' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-07' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-08' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-09' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-10' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-11' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUBSTRING(#{searchYm}, 0, 4) || '-12' FROM DUAL) GROUP BY TRST_DT having SUM(SELPCH1_QTY)>0 and SUM(SELPCH2_QTY)>0 ORDER BY TRST_DT
